extendedInfo.description: A 2-way interface for remote-controlling of the DF Solutions range of Media/Audio Servers.* Supports fully cover-arted browsing of Albums/Artists/Genres/Radio/Spotify/Movies.* Can build and edit playlists.* Full TV IR-control emulation (via Wifi).* Support for English/Russian/Spanish languages* Automatically detect servers/zones via Wifi.

reviews.title: Does everything I need
reviews.comment: It is so handy to have such a comprehensive remote control in my pocket at all times.total control of movies and music what more could you need. 1st class
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent app, controls my Base from anywhere!
reviews.comment: I have been using this app to control my Base for about a week now and it is really handy. I do not have to use my ir remote anymore as everything is as easy to do this this app. Accessing and playing any item in my music or movie library is a breeze, creating playlists is also easy to do. Recommend this for anyone using a DFSolutions Base or link!
reviews.author: A Google User
